formulas.name: f_Default_Process_Type
formulas.expression: CASE({!Screen_Select_Type}, "Run Erase My Data Policy", IF({!recordId.Contact__c}=null, {!choice_Deny_Request}, {!choice_Process_Request}), {!Choice_Run_Request_My_Data_Policy}, IF({!recordId.Contact__c}=null, {!choice_Deny_Request}, {!choice_Process_Request}), {!Choice_Run_Limit_Use_of_Sensitive_Data_Policy}, {!choice_Deny_Request}, {!Choice_Run_Correct_My_Info_Policy}, IF({!recordId.Contact__c}=null, {!choice_Deny_Request}, {!choice_Process_Request}), "")

formulas.name: f_Default_Screen_Text_Deny_Request_My_Data
formulas.expression: CASE({!Screen_Denial_Reason_Request_My_Data}, {!choice_Not_in_database}, "This request is being denied because the person is not in our database. Ready to confirm with the requestor.", {!choice_Identity_Not_Confirmed}, "Identity has not been verified, please confirm with the requestor and close the request.", {!choice_Requested_Data_Twice_in_Past_Twelve_Months}, "This request is being denied because the person requested their data more than twice over the past 12 months. Ready to confirm with the requestor.", "")

formulas.name: f_Default_Screen_Text_Process_Correct_My_Info
formulas.expression: IF( {!Screen_Process_Step_Correct_My_Info}={!choice_Process_Correction_of_Data}, "Information has been corrected. Ready to confirm with the requestor.", "Please clarify which data needs to be corrected.")

formulas.name: f_Default_Select_Type
formulas.expression: CASE(TEXT({!recordId.Type__c}), "Erase my personal information", {!Choice_Run_Erase_My_Data_Policy}, "Request a copy of my personal information", {!Choice_Run_Request_My_Data_Policy}, "Opt-out of the sale of my information", {!Choice_Run_Do_Not_Sell_Policy}, "Limit the use of my sensitive personal information", {!Choice_Run_Limit_Use_of_Sensitive_Data_Policy}, "Correct my personal information", {!Choice_Run_Correct_My_Info_Policy}, null)

formulas.name: f_Denial_Reason_Detail_Correct_My_Info
formulas.expression: IF({!recordId.Contact__c}=null, "Can not correct information because contact is not in database.", CASE({!Screen_Denial_Reason_Correct_My_Info}, {!choice_Contact_Unresponsive}, "Contact did not specify what data needs to be corrected.", {!choice_No_Data_to_Correct}, "Contact's data is correct.", "") )

formulas.name: f_Denial_Reason_Detail_Do_Not_Sell
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!Screen_Select_Type}={!Choice_Run_Do_Not_Sell_Policy}, {!Screen_Denial_Reason_Picklist_Do_Not_Sell}={!choice_Not_in_database}, TEXT({!recordId.Privacy_Law__c})="NJ Daniel's Law") , "Can not process because Mailing Address & Phone are not in our database", "")

formulas.name: f_Denial_Reason_Detail_Erase_My_Data
f_Denial_Reason_Detail_Limit_Sensitive_Data
f_Denial_Reason_Detail_Request_My_Data
formulas.expression: IF({!recordId.Contact__c}=null, "Can not provide copy of information because record is not in database.", CASE({!Screen_Denial_Reason_Request_My_Data}, {!choice_Identity_Not_Confirmed}, "Can not provide copy of information because identify was not verified.", {!choice_Requested_Data_Twice_in_Past_Twelve_Months}, "Reached limit of requesting data twice in the past twelve months.", "") )

formulas.description: Validation Rule on Contact: "Valid_Mailing_Province_Canada" --A valid two-letter Canadian province abbreviation is required.
formulas.name: f_True_If_Invalid_State_for_Canada
formulas.expression: IF( AND ( OR({!recordId.Country__c} = "CA", {!recordId.Country__c}="CAN"), NOT( CONTAINS("AB:BC:MB:NB:NL:NT:NS:NU:ON:PE:QC:SK:YT", {!recordId.State__c}) )) , True, False)

formulas.description: Validation Rule on Contact: "Valid_Mailing_State_for_USA" --A valid two-letter state abbreviation is required.
formulas.name: f_True_If_Invalid_State_for_US
formulas.expression: IF( AND ( OR( {!recordId.Country__c} = "US", {!recordId.Country__c}="USA", ISBLANK({!recordId.Country__c})), OR( LEN({!recordId.State__c}) = 1, NOT( CONTAINS("AL:AK:AZ:AR:CA:CO:CT:DE:DC:FL:GA:HI:ID:" & "IL:IN:IA:KS:KY:LA:ME:MD:MA:MI:MN:MS:MO:MT:NE:NV:NH:" & "NJ:NM:NY:NC:ND:OH:OK:OR:PA:RI:SC:SD:TN:TX:UT:VT:VA:" & "WA:WV:WI:WY:AS:GU:MP:PR:VI:FM:MH:PW:AA:AE:AP", {!recordId.State__c}) ))) , True, False)

formulas.description: Validation Rule on Contact: "Mailing_Zip_Code" --Zip code must be in 99999 or 99999-9999 format.
formulas.name: f_True_if_Zip_Code_Wrong_Format
formulas.expression: IF( AND( OR({!recordId.Country__c} = "USA", LEN({!recordId.Country__c}) = 0), OR(LEN({!recordId.Zip__c}) <> 0), OR( AND(LEN( {!recordId.Zip__c}) <>5, LEN({!recordId.Zip__c}) <> 10), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", LEFT( {!recordId.Zip__c}, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 2, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 3, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 4, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 5, 1))), AND( LEN( {!recordId.Zip__c} ) = 10, OR( MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 6, 1) <> "-", NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 7, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 8, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 9, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( {!recordId.Zip__c} , 10, 1))) ) ) ) ) , True, False)

textTemplates.name: tt_Email_Body_Deny_Correct_My_Info_Not_In_Database
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!recordId.First_Name__c} {!recordId.Last_Name__c},

Thank you for your request on {!recordId.Date_Received__c} to correct your personal information. After reviewing our records, we were unable to locate any personal data associated with the information you provided. As we do not have your data in our systems, there is no data to correct and as such this request has been closed. A copy of the original request has been retained to comply with regulatory, legal, and audit requirements.

{!f_Custom_Text_Deny_Correct_My_Info}Details of Your Request:

Date of Request: {!recordId.Date_Received__c}
Name: {!recordId.First_Name__c} {!recordId.Last_Name__c}
Address: {!f_Privacy_Request_Address_Combined}
Phone: {!recordId.Phone__c}
Email: {!recordId.Email__c}

For more information, please see e.Republics Privacy Policy available at https://www.erepublic.com/privacy. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please contact us at privacy@erepublic.com.

Best regards,

Privacy
e.Republic
privacy@erepublic.com


e.Republic LLC | 100 Blue Ravine Rd Ste 100, Folsom, CA 95630 | (916) 932-1300

Dear {!recordId.First_Name__c} {!recordId.Last_Name__c},

Thank you for your request on {!recordId.Date_Received__c} to correct your personal information. We previously reached out on {!f_Custom_Date_Deny_Correct_My_Info_Unresponsive} to clarify what data should be corrected in our database. Please note that since we have not heard from you, we have now closed this request. You can submit a new request to correct your personal information by visiting https://erepublic.my.salesforce-sites.com/PrivacyRequest.

{!f_Custom_Text_Deny_Correct_My_Info}For more information, please see e.Republics Privacy Policy available at https://www.erepublic.com/privacy. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please contact us at privacy@erepublic.com.

textTemplates.name: tt_Email_Body_Deny_Duplicate_Do_Not_Sell
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!recordId.First_Name__c} {!recordId.Last_Name__c},

Thank you for your request on {!recordId.Date_Received__c} to not sell your personal information. Please note that we previously received this request on {!f_Custom_Date_Deny_Do_Not_Sell} and had already updated our systems. textTemplates.name: tt_PDF_Body_Identity_Confirmed_Request_My_Data
textTemplates.text:
{!$Flow.CurrentDate}

Request for a copy of personal information

Request Number: {!recordId.Name}
Request Date: {!recordId.Date_Received__c}


Dear {!recordId.First_Name__c} {!recordId.Last_Name__c},

This notice responds to the request you submitted on {!recordId.Date_Received__c} that we disclose information about the personal information we collect about you. The disclosures you requested are below:

Categories of personal information we may collect:
  • Personal and demographic data such as name, title, company, phone, email, address and job function.
  • Email behavior including what emails you opened from us and which links you clicked.
  • Profile data, including username and password when you login to our services.
  • Device and location information about your website visit including browser type and IP address.
  • Transactional information including form submissions, billing, invoice, and payment information for orders of our goods or services.
Categories of sources from which your personal information may be collected:
  • Website form submissions when you sign up for products or services.
  • Your communication with us such as website visits and marketing email activity.
  • Publicly available sources such as websites and government records.
  • Third party data providers and processors. For more information visit, https://www.erepublic.com/subprocessors.
  • Market research surveys, interviews, and other research conducted by our in-house research team.
Our business or commercial purpose for collecting and using your personal information:
  • Enhance the user experience on our sites. We use tracking information to determine how well each page performs overall based on aggregate user demographics and traffic patterns to those pages. This helps us continue to build a better service for you and improve our products.
  • Location information for displaying more relevant content or advertisements to your geography. For example, a banner ad about a California product to those in California or an email about an upcoming event near you.
  • Communicate with you to send email communications with information we think will be of interest to you.
  • Fulfillment of materials you requested including subscriptions, event materials, downloads, books and emails.
  • Provide measurement to help our writers and advertisers measure the effectiveness of their content and understand our audience.
  • Stored for backup and analysis in a CRM system (Salesforce) and cloud servers (Amazon Web Services).
Categories of third parties to which we may disclose your personal information:
  • Our Sponsors: When you register with e.Republic, you will be asked if we may share your registration information with our sponsors .
  • Service Providers: Our third-party service providers (e.g., print subscription fulfillment, data analytics, customer support, email message deployment, and payment processors) may have access to your Personal Information to perform their contractual obligations to us.
  • Other Third Parties, as permitted by applicable law: For example if we go through a business transition (e.g., merger, acquisition, or sale of a portion of our assets); to comply with a legal requirement or a court order; when we believe it is appropriate to take action regarding illegal activities or prevent fraud or harm to any person; to exercise or defend our legal claims; or for any other reason with your consent.
  • Law enforcement, and other governmental agencies, at our sole discretion in connection with an investigation of any matter that is illegal or that could expose e.Republic or our affiliates or subsidiaries to liability.
  • Aggregated and De-Identified Information: e.Republic reserves the right to disclose aggregated, anonymized, or de-identified information about any individuals with non-affiliated entities for research, product development, marketing, or other purposes, without restriction.
List of specific pieces of personal information we have collected about you:

Profile & Activity information:

{!Privacy_Request_AL_Request_My_Data.var_Display_Full_Table}


For more information, please see e.Republics Privacy Policy available at https://www.erepublic.com/privacy. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please contact us at privacy@erepublic.com.

Best regards,

Privacy
e.Republic
privacy@erepublic.com


e.Republic LLC | 100 Blue Ravine Rd Ste 100, Folsom, CA 95630 | (916) 932-1300
